name: Pivot (Asphalt)
description:
Pivoting goes hand in hand with rapid iteration on your product. It's a lean principle that stipulates you fail early and often so that you can pivot your strategy where it needs to go. Don't be afraid to f*ck up - that's how we improve! Soft, slim, and light. This piece is screen printed on premium 100% fine combed cotton.
  • Please allow two to three weeks for shipping
  • Every purchase provides a t-shirt to an L.A. homeless
  • No hassle return policy

name: Passion Comes First
description:

description:

name: Done is Perfect
description:

name: Slim, Stretchy Blazer
description:
Slim fit, stretchy fabric. This blazer feels like a fucking hoodie. Throw this on like you would a sweater and hit the streets. You'll look confidant and polished but feel totally comfortable chilling on a couch. Comes in black and grey.

  • This is a prototype currently in development

name: Slim, Stretchy Button-Down
description:
Slim fit, soft, stretchy fabric. We call this an "All Day Button-Down" because you won't need to loosen your collar when it's social hour, it feels like a t-shirt. You could hit the gym in this bad boy. Comes in white, grey, and black.

  • This is a prototype currently in development

name: Slim, Stretchy Jeans
description:
Slim not skinny, with stretchy fabric. These are the staple of your wardrobe because they look like pants but move and feel like jeans. Pair them with the "All Day Button-Down", and the "Only Blazer You'll Own" in varying shades for the ultimate modern nerd look. Comes in black and grey.

  • This is a prototype currently in development

name: Basic Badass Hat
description:
Add a little hip-hop to your look with this staple trucker hat. F*ck logos. Comes in black.

  • This is a prototype currently in development

name: iPad Bag
description:
Fits an iPad, nothing else. For those times when you don't need your laptop but need more than your phone. If someone accuses you of carrying a gay-dude-purse. Knock them out and then tell them they just got f*cked up by a gay dude then. Comes in durable black leather.

  • This is a prototype currently in development
